pr_title: fix(TBD-10095): Sqoop issue with parquet format with EMR 5.15(2.8.3)

timeline.bodyText: You changed the condition from equal PARQUET to not equal AVRO. Is it equivalent. Don't we have other txt formats ?
timeline.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: No, this is not equal condition. In fact, it is what you just have mentioned: it covers all others (not avro) txt formats
replies.author: mtuhai

replies.bodyText: What is not clear here is that you will import SQOOP_PARQUET_MODULE_GROUP even for text formats
replies.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: Yes, job bundle for all file formats except avro, will contain parquet kite-* libraries. I do not think there is a reason to split non-avro group to several smaller groups to build smaller job bundle, as these jars are not conflicting. Additionally, I do not know how to realize condition in EMR5150SqoopModuleGroup class in this case.
replies.author: mtuhai

replies.bodyText:
I was a bit confused to see a group called PARQUET imported even for non parquet files (text files) and maybe you can't rename without impacting other distros. It won't help clarity for future maintenance.
Reguarding condition I can't see the issue to test each format independently
replies.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: Split non-avro groups to text-, sequence- and parquet- groups
replies.author: mtuhai

replies.bodyText: It is used in many other distros
replies.author: mtuhai

timeline.message: Merge branch 'fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order' of https://github.com/Talend/tbd-studio-se into fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order
Merge branch 'fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order' of https://github.com/Talend/tbd-studio-se into fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order
